sentences.en: A large crowd had assembled outside the American embassy.
sentences.cn: 一大群人聚集在美国大使馆外。

sentences.en: All the students were asked to assemble in the main hall.
sentences.cn: 全体学生获通知到大礼堂集合。

sentences.en: Assemble your papers and put them in the file.
sentences.cn: 把你的文件归拢放在这个文件夹内.

sentences.en: At last he began to assemble his safety razor.
sentences.cn: 最后他开始安装安全刮脸刀.

sentences.en: Greenpeace managed to assemble enough boats to waylay the ship at sea.
sentences.cn: 绿色和平组织设法聚集起足够数量的小船在海上拦截该船。

sentences.en: Groups of its inhabitants assemble to discuss the thing.
sentences.cn: 居民们三五成群地聚在一起,议论这件事情.

sentences.en: He looked around at the assembled company (=  all the people who had come there  ) .
sentences.cn: 他环顾四周聚集的人群。

sentences.en: If the fire - alarm goes, staff should assemble outside the building.
sentences.cn: 火警警报响时全体人员应到楼外集合.

sentences.en: It is difficult to assemble those sheets into a proper map.
sentences.cn: 很难将这些照片并合成合适的地图.

sentences.en: Please assemble this material into thematic groups.
sentences.cn: 请按主题将这些材料整理分类。

sentences.en: She had assembled a collection of her favourite songs.
sentences.cn: 她收集了一些自己最喜欢听的歌。

sentences.en: Some boys like to assemble model airplanes.
sentences.cn: 有些男孩喜欢装配模型飞机.

sentences.en: The aircraft will continue to be assembled in France.
sentences.cn: 飞机将继续在法国组装。

sentences.en: The anvil onto which the staples are pressed was not assemble correctly.
sentences.cn: 订书机上的铁砧安装错位.

sentences.en: The shed comes in sections that you assemble yourself.
sentences.cn: 这个棚子有几个部分,要由自己组装起来.

sentences.en: The shelves are easy to assemble.
sentences.cn: 搁架容易装配。

sentences.en: The sirens are calling the men to assemble.
sentences.cn: 警报声在召令士兵集合.

sentences.en: The students assemble for class at 8 o'clock in the morning.
sentences.cn: 学生早上八时聚集在一起上课.

sentences.en: The workers who assemble cars work very skilfully.
sentences.cn: 装配汽车的工人们干得很熟练.

sentences.en: We'll assemble at the gate at 7 o'clock tomorrow morning.
sentences.cn: 明晨七时在门口会齐.

words.tran_cn: 装配；集合；聚集；集会；集合物；聚集的物或人
汇编程序；汇编机；装配工

trans.tran_en: if you assemble a large number of people or things, or if they assemble, they are gathered together in one place, often for a particular purpose
if you assemble a large number of people or things, or if they assemble, they are gathered together in one place, often for a particular purpose

trans.tran_cn: 集合， 聚集， 召集； 装配
trans.tran_en: if you assemble a large number of people or things, or if they assemble, they are gathered together in one place, often for a particular purpose
